body.ab: In compliance with your request of the 19th inst., I have the honor to return herewith the papers which were received here under cover of a letter of the Secretary of the Treasury of the 30th of December last, relating to the case of The United States, vs. Brulatour, et al, and to state that I shall be pleased to have copies of those papers furnished this office by your Department.
I am, Sir, Very Resp. your obd't serv't,
